title: Neighborhood BBQ Bash
description: Join us for food, fun, and fellowship at our annual neighborhood BBQ.

title: Sunday Worship in the Park
description: Worship and praise under the open sky this Sunday morning!

title: Community Potluck
description: Bring a dish and a friend — let’s celebrate with a feast!

title: Chalk Art Challenge
description: Show off your sidewalk skills at our public chalk art competition.

title: Smoothie Stand for Youth
description: Youth-led smoothie stand fundraiser for our community trip.

title: Open Mic Praise Night
description: Share your voice, music, or story in this open mic night.

title: Book Swap & Coffee
description: Bring books you love and trade them for something new.

title: Bike Parade Downtown
description: Ride together and celebrate community — bikes, balloons, and music.

title: Family Field Day Extravaganza
description: Fun games, snacks, and team events for the whole family!
